jmea_default_open_location: Directory where load_mea() starts by default
parameter_list_default_open_location: Directory where import_parameter_list() starts by default
geometry_plot_default_open_location: Directory where plot_geometry() starts by default
dark_theme_checked: set_theme('dark') used if true, else set_theme('light')
plot-field-dir: Directory from which field data is extracted
plot-field-export-dir: Directory where field plot images are stored
pkl_file: Starting value for the .pkl file to extract
pkl_use_index: Whether to extract parameter vector from optimal set by index
pkl_use_weights: Whether to extract parameter vector from optimal set by weights
pkl_index: Value of the index used to extract parameter vector from optimal set
pkl_weights: Value of the weights used to extract parameter vector from optimal set (as a string)
scatter_default_brush_color: Starting fill color for scatter points
scatter_default_pen_color: Starting outline color for scatter points
scatter_hovered_brush_color: Hovered fill color for scatter points
scatter_hovered_pen_color: Hovered outline color for scatter points
scatter_selected_brush_color: Selected fill color for scatter points
scatter_selected_pen_color: Selected outline color for scatter points
cpnet_default_pen_color: Default pen color for Bezier curve control point nets
cpnet_default_pen_width: Default pen width for Bezier curve control point nets
cpnet_default_pen_dash: Default pen dash pattern for Bezier curve control point nets
cpnet_hovered_pen_width: Hovered pen width for Bezier curve control point nets
cbar-tick-font-family: Default tick label font family for color bars
cbar-tick-point-size: Default tick label font point size for color bars
axis-tick-font-family: Default tick label font family for axes
axis-tick-point-size: Default tick label font point size for axes
axis-label-point-size: Default axis label font point size
